item.title: Google tests Audio Overviews for Search queries
item.description: Google Search is testing Audio Overviews for certain search queries, the company announced on Friday.

item.title: Apple’s Liquid Glass design is paving the way for AR glasses
item.description: This visual overhaul gives us a glimpse into the design of Apple's rumored AR glasses, which will reportedly debut next year.

item.title: Silicon Valley tech execs are joining the US Army Reserve
item.description: CTOs from companies including OpenAI, Meta, and Palantir make up this first cohort of CTOs in the Army Reserve.

item.title: Amazon joins the big nuclear party, buying 1.92 GW for AWS
item.description: Amazon and Talen revised an existing deal to buy power from the Susquehanna nuclear power plant.

item.title: Startups Weekly: No sign of pause
item.description: This week brought us many reminders that no startup journey is linear — but the next billion-dollar idea may only be one click away.
